description: Improved effectiveness of poverty reduction and livelihood promotion programmes in disadvantaged regions and for the inclusion of poor women and men from Scheduled Caste and Scheduled Tribes groups and minorities.

subproject.description:
1- Government and communities better equipped to plan, monitor and ensure the inclusion of poor women and men from Scheduled Caste (SC) and Scheduled Tribe (ST) groups, minorities and the displaced in national poverty programmes.

2-. Disadvantaged people (poor women and men from Scheduled Caste and Scheduled Tribe groups, minorities and the displaced) in at least four UNDAF states benefit from livelihood strategies, public expenditure, and better delivery mechanisms.

3 - Elected representatives at all three levels, members of District Planning Committees and of participatory local development local functionaries understanding and performing their role in formulation, execution and monitoring plans and budgets, which ensure the inclusion of poor women and men from the Scheduled Caste and Scheduled Tribe groups and from minorities.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Women's Empowerment Phase I

subproject.description: The project  will promote inclusion agenda and increasing their effectiveness by linking them to credit and real markets. The project will advocate saturation approach include vulnerable sections like Schedule Caste, Schedule Tribes, women, etc. for delivering poverty impacts.
subproject.title: Livelihood Promotion-Orissa

subproject.description: Skill development of women and empowerment at community and various levels in the decision making process.  Focus on livelihood promotion at the district level and explore inclusion of persons with Disability and migrants for both skill development and livelihood promotion
subproject.title: Livelihood Promotion-Rajasthan

subproject.description: Skill development of women and empowerment at community and various levels in the decision making process.  Focus on livelihood promotion at the district level and explore inclusion of persons with Disability and migrants for both skill development and livelihood promotion
subproject.title: Livelihood Promotion-Rajasthan

subproject.description: Strengthening government capacities & coordination mechanisms, improving M&E system of selected poverty reduction programmes, supporting effective models of vulnerability reducing livelihood strategies and instruments in selected districts, increasing opportunities for diversifying livelihoods and skill development through engagements with private sector and integration with market and supporting advocacy and knowledge sharing for greater reflection of priorities and voices of the poor in design and implementation of programmes and policies.
subproject.title: Livelihood Promotion-Jharkhand
